title: Jonas Hellborg 1979 - 2014 discography - flac
description:
Jonas Hellborg 1979 - 2014 discography
A MUSIC torrent :)
Dig the bassic pulse of Jonas Hellborg:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonas_Hellborg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonas_Hellborg</a>

He's a swedidsh bass guitarist and he can be seen as the second generation of fusion...
Starting from the end of the seventies he has performed with John McLaughlin and Mahavishnu Orchestra, with Trilok Gurtu, Bill Laswell just to quote the most famous ones...

From them he has inherited that peculiar taste for oriental drifts which he expanded for instance in his works with Selvaganesh and Zakir Hussain and with the marvellous Shawn Lane.

Listening to him I understood how the bass guitar is not merely a background tool for rhythm, but a complete instrument developing complex musical structures. If you like jazz, if you like rock, if you like fusion drifting to metal too then you should appreciate his production.

This is not an exhaustive discography, since I stumbled on a good bunch in flac and I wanted to share it lossless as much as possible. There are 29 albums covering his main production and some collaborations and the AVI rip of a 2001 Live Concert in Paris with Shawn Lane and the Vinayakrams. The albums are all in flac except for 4 of them which I was unable to find lossless.

Several of the missing collaborations albums are available in other torrents of mine (i.e.: John Maughlin's and Trilok Gurtu's).

Enjoy :)
